howToCompareTop:
You can compare two temperaments to quickly visualize the differences in the temperament of thirds and fifths. The fifths are represented on the outside and thirds on the inside.

The first temperament selected is located on the inside and the second on the outside, both of which can be exchanged at any time.
howToCompareBottom:
You can compare the fractions of commas affecting fifths by changing the unit between syntonic comma and Pythagorean comma, as well as those affecting thirds.

The deviation table shows the deviation in cent according to equal temperament based on A.
